item.description: Traffic; INC#1529; 09:26PM; Wb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3g79pn0; outside city; Two car collision with fire involved and a total of four patients - two in critical condition and two in at least serious condition. Freeway will remain impacted for the duration of the operation. CHP Log#2970 No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 E24 E274 E298 E77 E91 E98 EM14 EM15 RA74 RA89 RA91 RA98 T74 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1384; 07:46PM; Sb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AM9oOX; Downtown; Four car traffic collision with one rollover. Firefighters are working to extricate two trapped patients (initial reports indicate they are not critically injured) and are evaluating an additional two patients to determine their medical needs. CHP has shut down the southbound freeway for the duration of the operation. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E203 E209 E220 E3 E9 EM1 HR3 RA20 RA4 T20 T3; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Rollover Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0852; 04:43PM; 11551 Doane Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u9fXcZ; Sunland; After a thorough search, firefighters did not locate any additional patients. The deceased occupant of the rollover vehicle is a male, estimated to be 40-50 yo. The incident was determined to be within the Angeles National Forest boundaries, therefore LA County Sheriff will handle the investigation. LAFD is conducted the body recovery operation and will perform a hoist operation to relocate the body to a nearby helispot and transfer custody to the LA County Coroner office. Any further media questions are referred to LA County Coroner and LA County Sheriff. No further details.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 E288 E289 E77 E90 E98 EM14 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 HR3 RA74 RA77 RH114 T74 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Rollover Vehicle - FATALITY; INC#0852; 03:10PM; 11160 N Oro Vista Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/35D5dcD; Sunland; Firefighters hiked down a hillside to locate a rollover vehicle and found one patient, determined dead on scene. Crews are now scouring the hillside to determine if there were any other occupants. LAFD Air Ops is responding to assist with the visual search. LAPD responding for the investigation. LAFD will transition to a body recovery once the search for additional patients is concluded. There was an additional vehicle that was not as far down the hillside which was from a previous incident 5 weeks ago and not part of this response. Original 9-1-1 call received at 2:15PM.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 E288 E289 E77 E90 E98 EM14 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 HR3 RA74 RA77 RH114 T74 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - Fire Now Out 01/30/2022 INC#0464

item.description: Structure Fire - Fire Now Out; INC#0464; 09:25AM; 2451 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3od42qJ; Westlake; Firefighters responded to a four story, modern center hall apartment building (senior living) and found smoke showing. After investigating both from the interior and the roof, firefighters located fire within a wall that appeared to have started in a bathroom and move up the pipe allow to the third floor. All floors were clear of smoke and residents were sheltered in place. Crews extinguished the fire (9:52AM) and opened up sections of the wall, as necessary, to ensure no further extension or continued smoldering. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 E11 E13 E20 E211 E235 EM11 RA11 RA13 RA813 SQ21 T11 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update - Final - Structure Fire; INC#1432; 09:30PM; 3494 N Oak Glen Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IRqZI6; #HollywoodHills; 67 LAFD Firefighters took just 30 minutes to access, offensively confine and fully extinguish fire that involved several Italian Cypress trees before it extended into the attic of an adjacent one-story home, damaged a car, and briefly threatened other homes nearby. No Injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 CM42 E227 E235 E260 E27 E278 E288 E290 E35 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA27 RA76 RA86 RH114 T27 T35 T60 T78 T88 T90; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Additional information pending.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E278 E288 E290 E35 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA27 RA76 RA86 RH114 T27 T60 T78 T88 T90; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1432; 08:16PM; 3494 N Oak Glen Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IRqZI6; #HollywoodHills; PRELIM: Fire showing from a one story home and vegetation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E260 E35 E86 RA76 RA86 T27 T60; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/29/2022 INC#0715

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0715; 12:40PM; 1584 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AGseqC; #CentralAlameda; Address Corrected From 21st Street. It took 84 LAFD personnel (assisted by jurisdictionally adjacent LACoFD crews in automatic aid) just 38 minutes to strategically access, defensively confine and offensively extinguish heavy fire within what is now described as *two-story* *150' x 100'* warehouse containing baled goods and commercial water delivery products. There have been no injuries. This Greater Alarm fire appears to have begun as an outside fire, which had already extended into and involved the structure on LAFD arrival. Fire cause now under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E203 E209 E211 E215 E221 E233 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM13 RA14 RA17 RA814 SQ21 T11 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88 + LACoFD E13 T13 BC13; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0715; 12:02PM; 1587 E 21st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GbCzfo; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: Outside fire has extended to and now heavily involves a 200' x 300' one-story metal-clad warehouse with fire through the roof.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E14 E209 E221 E233 E4 EM1 RA14 RA814 SQ21 T21 T33 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
